title: Health Data Visualization
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to view visual representations of my patients' health data so that I can make informed decisions regarding their care.

title: Care Task Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to create, assign, and track care tasks for my patients so that I can ensure all necessary care activities are completed on time.

title: Emergency Contact Notifications
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set up emergency contact notifications so that I can ensure timely intervention in case of critical health incidents for my patients.

title: Health Insights and Recommendations
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to analyze health data and provide me with insights and recommendations so that I can improve the care and wellness of my patients effectively.

title: Secure Data Sharing with Medical Staff
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to securely share health data with medical professionals so that I can ensure timely intervention and maintain my patients' well-being.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
summary: As a caregiver, I want to provide feedback about ALFRED's functionalities so that I can suggest improvements that enhance my monitoring and care process.
